About.title: About Me
About.description1: I am an artist dedicated to the craft of storytelling. With a passion for cinema and theater, I bring characters to life through deep emotional connection and authentic expression.
About.description2: My journey began on the stage, and has since evolved into a pursuit of complex roles in film and television. I believe in the power of vulnerability and the strength of silence.

Contact.title: Let's Create Together
Contact.description: Open for casting calls, collaborations, and artistic projects.
